Title: Relates to establishing requirements for restraining dogs outdoors
Summary: Establishes requirements for restraining dogs outdoors, requirements for the tether used to restrain a dog, the penalties for a violation of these provisions and exceptions to such requirements.
LawCode: Add ยง353-g, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to restraining dogs outdoors
